data.text:
@secresdoge [3/3]Wir stehen in engem Kontakt mit den entsprechenden Institutionen, um so schnell wie möglich eine Lösung zu finden.
Liebe Grüße, Gayle

@secresdoge [2/3]Wir haben nie ein Verbot für solche Geräte ausgesprochen. Es ist an den Behörden, die Vorschriften anzupassen, die derzeit die Verwendung dieser Geräte für Fluggäste im aufgegebenen Gepäck beschränken.

data.text: @StevenGothard Hi Steven, thank you for reaching out. How can we assist you? Kind regards, Funda

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @tmount Hi Trevor, we are sorry to hear that our offers did not meet your expectations. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/sSgtzBHDw8 Kind regards, Chris

@matthiasrousavy Hi Matthias, grundsätzlich schreibt Spanien noch eine Maskenpflicht vor. Für unsere Crews gilt eine Hinweispflicht. Schicke uns bitte eine PN mit dem Flugnummer und Datum und wir leiten dein Feedback gerne weiter. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@Sageniuz Hi, leider kommt es aufgrund einer Überschwemmung des Runways in Heraklion zu Flugumleitungen. Betroffene Gäste werden vor Ort betreut oder hier in Wien von unseren KollegInnen vom Bodenpersonal. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

data.text: @SistahWilson @lufthansa Hi, I am sorry you received conflicting information. Please send us a PM with your booking code so we can check the onboard upgrade options for that route. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@iiref15 Hi, please send us a PM with your claim number with the reference number XXXX-OS-XXXXX  or OS-XXXXXX Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @AntoineBosonnet Hi Antoine, we apologize one more time for any inconvenience caused. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/Ol8KOMY1iy Kind regards, Chris
@BashkimSahiti2 Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us the reference number of your claim in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @saddaysarehere @bangkok_airways @lufthansa @FlySWISS Hi there, we are sorry your flight was canceled. Kindly send us your booking code or a ticket number via PM, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Petra
@sonde58 Hi Sonja, wir bitten um Verständnis, dass wir aus Datenschutzgründen keine Namen unserer KollegInnen weitergeben können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@Sobhan85660532 [2/2] If you already sent our online form regarding compensation, our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Due to the current situation, the response can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@Sobhan85660532 [1/2] Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage as we do not have access to the baggage system.

@doctor_agarwal Hi there, we apologize for the impression you had. However, we strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism. We are an international operating company, our staff is from all over the world and we cherish and love this multicultural climate very much. Kind regards, Chris

@AntoineBosonnet Hi Antoine, I'm sorry that you missed your connecting flight and for the inconvenience caused by this circumstance. Whenever we can, we try to wait for passengers. Unfortunately, it is not always possible for multiple reasons, i.e. airport slots. Kind regards, Petra

data.text:
@mprelec Hello Marko,
you might have to contact miles and more for your request as we do not offer retro milage credit cards.
Best regards
Alessandra

@nieszprot Dear Lukasz,
I really do understand your frustration & while I cannot give you a precise timeline as to when your claim will be processed, I can assure you that the team is working hard to get back to you as soon as possible. We really appreciate your patience. Best regards, Mae

data.text: @JessicaJagec @eDreams @united Hi, if the ticket number begins with 257 then please fill in our refund form https://t.co/fqq8Ht9T8r clearly stating that you have not received a satisfactory response from edreams. If it starts with 016 please contact United Airlines  Kind regards, Lyndsay

@kkastenhofer Hi Klaus, wir unterstützen die Initiative mit gebrauchten Plastikbechern der Passagiere und andere Einwegplastikartikel die zu Rohöl verarbeitet werden. Kerosin bekommen wir dafür nicht. :)  Liebe Grüße, Sandra
@ecoana_83 Hi Ana, Thanks for reaching out. Kindly send us your booking code via PM, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Petra

data.text: @JessicaJagec @eDreams @united Hi Jessica, we are sorry to hear of your experience. If the ticket was issued by edreams then they are our first port of call. If the ticket was issued on Austrian stock please fill out our online refund form if you do not hear back from edreams. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@QueenBeeBee2023 @AustriaAirSucks Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage hasn't been delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to our baggage systems. Please email CentralBaggage.Tracing@austrian.com directly Kind regards, Lyndsay

@Katlin_Holland Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average response time. We apologize for the delay. Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Kiran1705 Hi Kiran, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/Ol8KONf4ky Kind regards, Chris

@sekerova Hi Zuzana, We ask for your understanding that due to the high volume of requests, it is not possible to process all of them within the usual time limits. Unfortunately, we cannot advise a specific time frame. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @_John19_ Hi Johannes, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Alternatively, you can send your request via the following form https://t.co/KvLtbwmPKk  However, we kindly ask for your understanding that the response can take longer due to the number of requests. Kind regards, Chris

@_john19_ Dear Johannes,
please contact our helpdesk:

German: ​+43 5 1766 3000
Monday to Friday: 7:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.
Saturday and Sunday: 10:30 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

English: ​+43 5 1766 3100
Monday to Sunday: 12:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.
Best regards
Alessandra

We are honored to have hosted today's crisis response training within the @_austrian Maintenance Hangar and on one of our aircraft ✈️ Trainings like this make a significant contribution to ensure the safety of our passengers and crew members! https://t.co/iBLjpJcHS5
@_John19_ Dear Johannes, did you try to use a different browser and empty your cache? Kind regards, Derya

@SylviaVfit Dear Sylvia,
I am truly sorry to read that we didn't meet your expectations.
Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Austrian Airlines values your feedback. We will relay your message to our colleagues and serious consideration will be given to this.
Best regards
Alessandra

@maxschrems Hi Max, sorry, dass du so verärgert bist. Ich hoffe deine "fuck you"-Wut ist schon abgeflaut und wir können uns das Thema mit dir anschauen. Schick' uns gerne deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Liebe Grüße, Sandra
@PS27574180 Hi, please send us a PM with your booking code and the change you would like to make and we will check your request. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

sorry to hear you're still waiting. We kindly ask you for some more patience. Our colleagues are doing their best.

Alessandra
@_John19_ Hi Johannes, I'm very sorry. There is some technical problem at the moment. Our IT is informed. Thank you for your feedback. Best regards, Denis

data.text:
@thelilyhyde Hi Lily, 
we are sorry to hear that you had issues getting in touch with us via phone. Please let us know, how we can assist you. 
Thank you for your patience.
Best regards, Shawn

@inknn [2/2] Bitte sende uns deinen Referenzcode per PM, damit wir nachsehen können, ob deine Anfrage korrekt eingetroffen ist. Wir bitten erneut um deine Geduld und dein Verständnis. 
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@inknn [1/2] Hallo Inken,
es tut uns leid, dass du noch keine Antwort erhalten hast. Das ist natürlich nicht der Service den wir unseren Gästen bieten möchten und entspricht nicht unserem Standard.
@petepa Hi there, have you tried already another browser or clearing your caches? Perhaps that might help. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @Leah_Byz Hi Leah, have you tried already another browser like Google Chrome? Perhaps clearing your caches will help. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @BruceMcAlliste1 Hi Bruce, have you already filled out this online form here: https://t.co/gkxxizYFTQ? If not, please fill it out with your reference nr and our colleagues will take a closer look into your case. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ankasi78 Hi Anja, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your flight with us. Please send your feedback regarding the lounge via the following online form https://t.co/5TSobf8A3z Our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Chris

@bentleybrowning Hi Bentley, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage as we do not have access to the baggage system. Kind regards, Chris

@camillacaros [1/2]Hello Camilla,
Apologies for all the inconvenience. Our colleagues are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time.

@camillacaros [2/2]We are very sorry for this and take all the necessary steps to get your baggage back to you as soon as possible. Until then, we kindly ask for your understanding.
Best regards, Gayle

@gregormeiering Hallo Gregor, es tut uns leid, dass du noch keine Antwort erhalten hast. Nachdem wir alle Anliegen unserer Kunden individuell und detailliert beantworten, kann die Bearbeitung manchmal länger dauern.
Liebe Grüße, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @pixiesepi Hi there, we are sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. If you haven't done so already, please fill out the feedback form here https://t.co/FFefe6JYo1 Kind regards, Petra

@UA_Initiative Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@cataclysmuk [2/2] We are therefore not able to check you in in advance. However, please advise your seat preference, so we can already assign a seat for you. To complete the process we kindly ask you to visit our check-in desk at the airport directly. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @cataclysmuk [1/2] Hi there, due to data protection reasons we advise not to share your booking code publicly. We just retrieved your reservation and inform you, that due to the current entry regulations at your final destination, your documents have to be checked manually.
@WolfgangWeinkum Lieber Wolfgang, vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Wir haben die Nachfrage bereits intern weitergeleitet und melden uns schnellstmöglich wieder bei dir. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@BruceMcAlliste1 Hi Bruce, we are sorry that you have not received a reply yet. Unfortunately, our colleagues are currently working through a backlog of claims. They will be in touch as soon as they can. We apologize for the delay and further inconvenience caused. Kind regards, Petra

@drtelwala Hi Darpan, your case has been received by our colleagues, but we are experiencing longer processing times than usual due to the current situation in the airline industry, which is suffering from shortages. Our colleagues will get back to you as soon they can. Kind regards, Petra
@mss_steph Hi there, we are sorry to hear that you are experiencing technical issues with our website. Have you tried opening it in another browser? Kind regards, Petra

@drtelwala Hi Darpan, did you already send the information via the contact form Funda has asked you for? If so please send us the email reference you were assigned automatically. It´s a number of 7 digits. Best regards, Denis
@JorisFalter [2/2)  you will of course be rebooked to your final destination. Kind regards, Funda

@JorisFalter [1/2] Hi Joris, the minimum connecting time of 25 minutes (for Star Alliance flights) is one of the fastest in Europe. The distances between your arrival and departure gates are short. In case you should miss your flight due to a flight irregularity,
@drtelwala Hi Darpan, please send us the file reference and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda

@camillacaros Hi Camilla, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We, the social media team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Best regards, Petra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @sekerova Hi Zuzana, the drop-down option refers to the country-specific phone numbers of our call center. We kindly ask you to fill out our contact form, here https://t.co/5rJWBmytPR by clicking on "after" then  "complaint" and then "next" Kind regards, Petra
@Xiai Hi Shaina, I am sorry to hear. How can we assist you? Best regards, Denis

@GeorgeWgunn Hi George, thanks for your message and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenient experience. Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via PM in order to be assisted accordingly. Kind regards, Denis

@iiref15 Hi, I  am very sorry that you have not received your luggage yet. Unfortunately, the Social Media team cannot assist with baggage claims. Have you already emailed CentralBaggage.Tracing@austrian.com as well? Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @kal_vachev @WellsFargo @lufthansa Hi there, well, we wouldn´t charge you without notice or confirmation by you via phone or personally. Please try to get in touch with your credit card details as it looks like a fraud case. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @PkeyurP @berlinairport [2/2] Currently there is a significant backlog of bags for processing in Berlin so this may take some time. We kindly ask you for your patience. Kind regards, Derya

@PkeyurP @berlinairport [1/2]Hi Keyur, please accept my sincere apologies for the delay with your baggage. In order to get any update on your baggage please get in touch with the contact points on your baggage report.

data.text:
@kal_vachev @WellsFargo Hi there, we never charge customers without notice. Please send us your booking reference via DM, we will take a closer look. Thank you.
Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @LisaJaneH1209 Hi, we are sorry to hear that your journey has been affected by a cancelation. In order to submit your request for any compensation or refund, we kindly ask you to use our online form on our web page. Please use the following link: https://t.co/KvLtbwEr8U Best regards, Shawn

@TvExplode @ST_Travel [2/2]Our respective colleagues will get in touch with you as soon as they have further information. Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards, Shawn

@TvExplode @ST_Travel [1/2] Hi there, we are sorry to hear that you haven't received any reply yet. Our respective colleagues are receiving submissions daily and process all of them individually. Unfortunately, this leads to longer waiting times. We do apologize for this.
@i_Petros us, so we appreciate your feedback all the more. We look forward to welcoming you onboard again soon! 😊 Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

@i_Petros Hi Petros, we are very pleased to receive your praise for our crew and hear that you felt so at ease on board. Not many passengers take the time to also share their positive experiences with [1/2]

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @sekerova Hi Zuzana, I'm sorry to hear that. Please fill in your inquiry via the respective online form: https://t.co/5rJWBmytPR to investigate things further. Please select that your concern arose after the trip. Best regards, Christiane
@Ond1n3 offer is still the decision of each passenger. Passengers, entitled to priority boarding, can also go onto the last bus. Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

@Ond1n3 Hi there, we totally get your point. Nevertheless, priority boarding is always offered for people who are entitled, as still some passengers prefer it. They can use it, but the decision to go first on the bus and use this [1/2]

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @BuenoPonchio you can contact them via desktop version through this online form: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne

@BuenoPonchio Hi Heitor, we're truly sorry that you haven't received your luggage yet. Have you filed a report at the lost & found counter at the airport? You will have received there a Passenger Irregularity Report where the contact from the responsible colleagues is stated. Otherwise, [1/2]

@Duck_Malakes @RipoffReport Hi, We are aware that response times are much longer than they are supposed to be at the moment, and we want to apologize for the frustration caused by this. Still, we assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you as soon as possible.
Kind regards, Petra

data.text: @sophieallinson Hallo Sophie, wenn du bereits ein Profil für Lufthansa, Austrian, Swiss oder Miles&More hast, ist dein Konto weiter aktiv und es muss keine Travel ID angelegt werden. Falls nicht, kannst du dich direkt über folgenden Link: https://t.co/JRap7pywmD anmelden. Liebe Grüße, Christiane
@ta_nevra_mou_ Hi there, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

@vagelis_h Hi Vagelis, we are sorry to hear that your case has not been resolved so far. Please send us the reference number of your case (XXXX-OS-XXXXX) in a DM so we can investigate further. Kind regards, Chris

@bes85548054 Hi there, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience.  Kind regards, Chris
